content: landyn tahj is the sixth square in a series designed as a legacy for my grandchildren landyn has a wicked sense of humor is highly spirited and does not hesitate to voice his opinion he has lots of sharp edges but the biggest heart you will ever know oh and he loves basketball the square has 39 stitches per side gauge is not important so use any yarn and applicable hook that you please once again a big thank you to the testers eva neetsey liz aparna paulina sandre sofia andrienne sheela pauline andrea and nina **join my facebook group at a yarn of serendipity crochet group 1 links to all my patterns are found on my blog 2 or pinterest 2 ** 2 links to all my patterns are found on 1 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity 2 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
